title: Beach Cleanup Initiative
description: A community-driven project to clean up plastic waste and debris from local beaches.

title: Coral Reef Restoration
description: A project focused on restoring damaged coral reefs through sustainable practices.

title: Sea Turtle Conservation
description: Protecting sea turtle nesting sites and raising awareness about marine life conservation.

title: Mangrove Reforestation
description: Planting mangroves to combat coastal erosion and support marine ecosystems.

title: Sustainable Fishing Practices
description: Promoting sustainable fishing methods to protect marine biodiversity.
